"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":587331,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8b0606e6-f73f-4776-a5e6-ac442e522545/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8b0606e6-f73f-4776-a5e6-ac442e522545/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8b0606e6-f73f-4776-a5e6-ac442e522545\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":815,\"height\":276},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What to expect?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to the Corporate Integrity Agreement (CIA): Ensuring Compliance training.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course will first provide an overview of the elements of an effective\\r compliance program because those elements are the foundation of the Walgreens compliance program.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then, the course will cover the basics of a Corporate Integrity Agreement (CIA) and summarize the Walgreens CIA and its corresponding obligations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From there, the course will segue into Fraud, Waste, and Abuse (FWA) by exploring examples and real-life cases of FWA, how to watch out for it, and what to do if you witness it. Finally, the course will cover the required compliance training from the Centers of Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS), and wrap up with resources.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
